Reviews.Title: Great little television
Reviews.Author: Donna R. Sandoval
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tv for my kitchen. I am so glad I ordered this one. The picture is excellent and the sound is clear. It was easy to set up and simple to operate. I would recommend the Samsung LN22C500 22-Inch to anyone wanting a great tv for an office, kitchen or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: 22" Samsung
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Great picture but, the sound is awful. In fact I had to purchase a sound bar which greatly improved the audio. It is a shame that Samsung ignored  this important facet of the tv watching and listening experience.

Reviews.Title: 22 inch Samsung LCD HDTV 1080p LN22C500
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN22C500 22 inch 1080p LCD HDTV (BLACK).  Arrived very quick and the picture quality is super.  Very nice TV

Reviews.Title: Not 720p
Reviews.Author: Tom Nelson
Reviews.Content: According to the specs on this page this model is 1080p, not 720p as the product title states. The Samsung web site also says this model is 1080p. [...]
